description: Available in English only. Recently given a 5/5 review on mobiobie.com, saying "...It is brilliant, addictive stuff..."  Do you think you are fast with your fingers?? Bubble Beats is the addictive new game that will test your screen tapping skills while keeping your mind off more important things in life.  Tap the bubbles as they move by to release the musical notes.  The rules are simple.  Pop as many bubbles as possible in each level before they float away.  As you move up in levels the bubbles move faster, and you have to pop more bubbles in each level.  Go fast to get a speed bonus, but be careful, if you miss too many bubbles the game is over. Pop as many bubbles as you can in each level and a get major point bonus points.  Pass it around to your family and friends to see who has the fastest fingers!  Good Luck!!  Future updates to Bubble Beats will include more sound effects, musical choices, global high scores, and the ability to play your own songs while you play the game.  ** Update v1.1.0 - New animated background!. Fixes to some performance problems ***
